title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Adaptive Hashing Techniques for Multimedia Search Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary machine learning concepts and understanding of data structures
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain key concepts and application fields of multimedia data retrieval.
Learners can analyze the fundamental principles and limitations of unsupervised learning-based hashing techniques.
Learners can understand and explain the core components (FPA/MCH modules) of Parameter-Adaptive Cross Hashing (PACH).
Learners can practice designing hashing codes considering cross-modal semantic consistency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
